title: Looking for the "Unit Pride" font.
content:
Hello Everyone,   
   
I looking for this font from this out of print war novel written in 1981. Any help would be appreciated. Sorry the pic is so blurry, its the only one I could find off hand.   
   
xxx   
Carl ![Unit Pride pic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130216im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37774.jpg)
author: our_turn

comments.content: You can get very close with [Gothic Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130216/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/gothic-heavy/gothic-heavy/testdrive.html?s=UNIT%2BPRIDE&p=48), though this is heavier and the bar on the E is extended. Engravers Gothic or Sackers Gothic may also suffice.

ITC Blair is very similar too.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blair-itc/bold/testdrive.html?s=UNIT+PRIDE&p=72](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130216/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blair-itc/bold/testdrive.html?s=UNIT%2BPRIDE&p=72)
i thought of bauersche giesserei astoria
